body_html: Ok, fixed using THAtomicAddLong from THAtomic.h (std::atomic<uint64_t> doesn't link). Unfortunately this means philox_seed_offset is now int64_t instead of uint64_t, but I don't think it should matter much.
body_text: Ok, fixed using THAtomicAddLong from THAtomic.h (std::atomic<uint64_t> doesn't link). Unfortunately this means philox_seed_offset is now int64_t instead of uint64_t, but I don't think it should matter much.
body: Ok, fixed using `THAtomicAddLong` from `THAtomic.h` (`std::atomic<uint64_t>` doesn't link). Unfortunately this means `philox_seed_offset` is now `int64_t` instead of `uint64_t`, but I don't think it should matter much.
